name: Mission: Drift
description:
In Mission: Drift you have one mission: to Drift! Drive and slide your way across the map to destroy boxes and the car of your enemy.

Your enemy was stupid enough to lend you his car. Now's your chance to damage it. Crashing is failure for your enemy, but a win for you.

----------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Accelerate: left mouse

Reverse: right mouse

Menu: M
